description: Shop MAKE UP FOR EVER’s Ultra HD Microfinishing Pressed Powder at Sephora. It blurs, smooths, and reduces shine for a perfected, matte finish.
details:
What it is:
An ultra-blurring, light-diffusing, pressed finishing powder that imparts unfiltered perfection for all skin tones.

What it does:
Blur, smooth, and reduce shine with the even, natural-looking, matte coverage this finishing powder. It’s infused with a lightweight formula of silica and micronized pigments that absorbs excess oils, illuminates features, and diminishes the look of fine lines and wrinkles. Ultra HD Pressed Powder has been revamped with ultra-fine texture to give everyone the look of a second-skin finish. Formulated to appear invisible with Ultra HD 4K technology, this powder is ideal for all skin tones, while the non-drying formula delivers a visibly flawless finish in any light. The portable compact is available in three shades: 1 Translucent for light-to-medium skin tones, 2 Banana for medium-to-tan skin tones, and 3 Peach for tan-to-dark skin tones.

What else you need to know:
Deeply connected to the evolving needs of professional makeup artists and consumers alike, MAKE UP FOR EVER developed ULTRA HD to meet the demands of the next generation of digital devices that display images with stunning clarity, unbelievable detail, and heightened color. Featuring a wide array of foundation and concealer shades for diverse skin tones, ULTRA HD offers everything you need to prep, cover, and finish for a flawless, natural-looking complexion.

A makeup set that includes a full size Maxilash mascara and a face primer.

Experience astonishing volume and staggering curl thanks to a high-performance polymer trio in Maxilash Mascara. The first one wraps the lashes in extremely adherent oils to thicken the lashes. The second one, made with supple waxes, acts like a conditioner, softening the lashes so you can sculpt them into just the right shape and style. The last one acts like a finishing hairspray to set the amazing curve.

Météorites Primer smooths and color-corrects your skin tone for a radiant complexion. Infused with a delicate violet scent, it’s formulated with Guerlain’s signature Stardust Technology: a unique complex encapsulating a celestial powder that transforms light invisible to the naked eye into visible and soft-focus perfecting light to blur imperfections and provide exceptional radiance. The fresh gel texture melts with the rosy pearls to give skin a radiant and glowing finish, while neutralizing excess sebum for a long-lasting matte complexion.

description:
What it is:
A tube-forming, water-resistant mascara that gives buildable, glamorous volume with no smudging, flaking, running, or clumping.

What it does:
After almost a decade in development, Blinc Mascara Amplified provides incredible, buildabl
details:
What it is:
A tube-forming, water-resistant mascara that gives buildable, glamorous volume with no smudging, flaking, running, or clumping.

What it does:
After almost a decade in development, Blinc Mascara Amplified provides incredible, buildable volume and length, all while offering their signature LifeProof properties of the original Blinc Mascara—smudge-proof, sweat-proof, water-resistant, and flake-proof. As with the original, Mascara Amplified coats lashes with a glossy, volumizing and extending coat that forms tiny water-resistant “tubes” around the lash. But, unlike the first formula, this one applies more like a traditional mascara, giving you the ability to add as many coats as you want to build your desired look! Because it is not as wet of a formula, you can even go back and reapply if needed, after it dries.

What else you need to know:
Removing Blinc Mascara Amplified is just as easy, and requires no makeup remover. Simply apply a little warm water along with some gentle pressure, and the tubes easily slide off your lashes. You will actually see the tiny tubes in your hand as it comes off without leaving any messy black tint or residue behind.
ingredients:
Black
-Acrylates Copolymer.

Water, Acrylates Copolymer, Stearic Acid, Propylene Glycol, PEG-8 Dimethicone, Polysilicone-11, Beeswax (Cera Alba), Silica, Glyceryl Stearate, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Nylon-66, Aminomethyl Propanol, Sodium Polyacrylate, Tetrasodium Pyrophosphate, Ammonium Hydroxide, o-Cymen-5-OL, Laureth-12, Methylisothiazolinone. May contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77489, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).
use:
Suggested Usage:
-To apply, use Blinc Mascara Amplifed on clean and dry lashes.
-Brush on until you have achieved the desired degree of lash separation, volume, and length.
-You can build on additional volume by applying as many coats as you wish.
-For removal, neither water or pressure alone will remove Blinc Mascara Amplifed. Only the combination of lots of warm water and gentle pressure from your fingertips, a washcloth, or water pressure (i.e. shower) will slide the tiny tubes off your lashes effortlessly.
-Upon removal, you will actually see tiny tubes in your hand!

details:

A priming, "instant porefection complexion" kit that minimizes the appearance of pores and shine—now featuring the matte highlighter, shy beam, an exclusive preview to Sephora.

What it does:
These purse-friendly minis are your secret weapon for minimizing pores and shine while on the go. Pat on the bestselling primer, the POREfessional, on to moisturized skin to minimize the appearance of pores and to lock makeup in place. Sweep on the POREfessional: agent zero shine to mattify your complexion, and then glide on the matte highlighter, shy beam, along the cheeks and brow bones, or anywhere you want to enhance for a subtle, glowing look. Apply cult-favorite balm, dr. feelgood, with its accompanying sponge for an ultrasoft complexion. Then finish off with POREfessional: license to blot, an oil blotting stick that can be used on the face using short, swift strokes to eliminate shine.

This set contains:
- 0.15 oz Shy Beam (mini size)
- 0.25 oz The POREfessional (mini size)
- 0.05 oz The POREfessional: license to blot (mini size)
- 0.05 oz The POREfessional: agent zero shine (mini size)
- 0.25 oz Dr. feelgood (mini size)
- Tips and Tricks

What else you need to know:
Beauty Tip: All products can be worn alone or over makeup.
use:
Suggested Usage:

-Pat this primer on moisturized skin to minimize the look of pores and help makeup stay put.

What it is:
A setting spray that locks makeup in place while visibly minimizing shine and pore size with the power of white charcoal.

Solutions for:
- Pores
- Dryness
- Oiliness

If you want to know more…
The White Charcoal Mattifying MakeUp Setting Spray provides continuous oil control for hydrated skin, all-day makeup wear, and a matte finish. The fine mist sets makeup as it simultaneously treats the skin with a blend of effective botanical ingredients known for their absorbent properties. Binchotan white charcoal controls excess oil, detoxifies the pores, and balances the skin's moisture content. Artichoke leaf extract and black tea visibly minimize the appearance of enlarged pores instantly and over time by increasing skin elasticity and brightening the pore wall. Vitamin-rich, antioxidant black tea also works to protect skin against free radical damage.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product has been dermatologically tested to be safe for sensitive skin. It is formulated without preservatives, artificial fragrances, colors, or ethanol alcohol.

description: Shop BECCA’s Shimmering Skin Perfector® Poured Crème Highlighter at Sephora. It leaves a delicate, smooth, and sophisticated glow.
details:
What it is:
A creamy highlighter that imparts a delicate, smooth, and sophisticated glow.

What it does:
Looking for an easy soft glow? Shimmering Skin Perfector® Poured Crème Highlighter will give you an elegant, radiant glow in a pinch. It’s the best choice for a low-maintenance highlight that is travel- and fingertip-friendly. Inspired by the delicate, flattering glow of moonlight, this unique, lustrous formula uses ultra-fine, pigmented pearls to create an easy, subtle luminosity. Tap it onto the highpoints of the face for a sophisticated, gentle glow. The incredibly rich yet smooth, creamy formula, brings light and lift to your best features, while smoothing skin for a youthful glow. The sheer, creamy texture makes it effortless to apply—and you can never go overboard.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
Shimmering Skin Perfector® Poured Crème Highlighter is perfect for highlighting novices and if you have dry or mature skin.

description: Shop Milk Makeup’s Sunshine Skin Tint at Sephora. It delivers SPF 30 coverage that is weightless, natural-looking, radiant, and buildable.
details:
What it is:
A weightless, preservative-free liquid foundation that hydrates skin while providing buildable, natural-looking coverage and SPF 30.

What it does:
Roll and blend your way to radiant happy skin. With its ultra-fresh formula, this liquid foundation offers coverage that is weightless, natural-looking, radiant, and buildable, while providing SPF 30. Infused with a blend of avocado, mandarin, grapeseed, and olive oils, Sunshine Skin Tint delivers ultimate nourishment and hydration that leaves skin feeling fresh and light. Its anti-microbial packaging contains silver which allows for a preservative-free foundation.

The glass rollerball applicator glides onto skin for quick, mess-free, on-the-go use, and no brushes are needed. For a full face, two to three clicks of the push button will provide the perfect amount of Skin Tint. Just adjust as needed to reach your desired coverage. For targeted touchups, one click is all that you need.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens
- Sulfates
- Phthalates

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and free of preservatives.

description: Shop Too Faced x Kat Von D’s Better Together Cheek & Lip Makeup Bag Set at Sephora. It features four lip and cheek minis in heart-shaped makeup bag.
details:
What it is:
A heart-shaped makeup bag, featuring Kat Von D and Jerrod Blandino’s beloved pets—plus, four minis in just-released, exclusive shades.

What it does:
Better Together is a totally unprecedented collaboration between coveted makeup icons, Kat Von D and Too Faced Cosmetics. Get ready to fall in love with this darling double-sided makeup pouch, featuring Kat’s cat Piaf and Jerrod’s dog Clover. Inside the heart-shaped bag, there are four minis for cheeks and lips in just-released shades found only in this set.

Rock your lips with Kat’s bestselling lipstick formulas—Studded Kiss and Everlasting Liquid Lipstick. This set contains a mini Studded Kiss Lipstick in shimmering nude Muse, along with a mini Everlasting Liquid Lipstick in matte oxblood XO. Let both formulas drench your lips in long-lasting pigment with true all-day comfort.

Treat your cheeks to Too Faced’s Love Flush Blush in the new exclusive shade So Happy Together, a peony pink. The long wear, pigment-rich powder keeps you perfectly flushed for up to 16 hours. Add a soft luminosity with Candlelight Glow Highlighting Powder Duo in the fan-favorite shade, Rosy Glow, to finish your look.

This set contains:
- 0.04 oz/ 1.2 g Mini Kat Von D Studded Kiss Lipstick in Muse (shimmering nude)
- 0.10 oz/ 3 mL Mini Kat Von D Everlasting Liquid Lipstick in XO (matte oxblood)
- 0.07 oz/ 2.0 g Mini Too Faced Love Flush Blush in So Happy Together (peony pink)
- 0.08 oz/ 2.5 g Mini Too Faced Candlelight Glow Highlighting Powder in Rosy Glow (golden sheer)
- Double-Sided Makeup Bag

What else you need to know:
The Too Faced and Kat Von D collaboration began with an authentic friendship between the two founders, Kat and Jerrod—who love, respect and celebrate one another, realizing they’re more alike than they are different. Better Together is a celebration of Kat Von D’s signature bold, edgy beauty and Too Faced’s unabashedly pink, pretty style in one must-have limited edition collection!

"I am proud to say that Kat Von D Beauty has never tested on animals—and never will."—Kat Von D

"Too Faced has always been and will always be cruelty-free. It's more than just business, it's my heart."—Jerrod Blandino

-Outline lip with applicator tip.

Too Faced Candlelight Glow Highlighting Powder:
-Apply around the brow and cheekbones, along bridge of nose, and Cupid’s bow to contour the most flattering angles of the face.
-Use each shade separately for either brightening or warming, or blend them together to warm and brighten the complexion.

 The Contour Duo On The Go features face-accentuating must haves, including easy-to-use The Sculpting Po
details:
What it is:
A contour duo featuring a bestselling highlighter and bronzer to sculpt, define, and illuminate the face structure.

What it does:
The Contour Duo On The Go features face-accentuating must haves, including easy-to-use The Sculpting Powder. This sheer formula glides on effortlessly for a crease-fee finish that mimics natural skin, offering minimal-to-full coverage to enhance the look of bone structure. The complex features brown, red, and grey pigments to give off a natural-looking shadow effect that's ideal for all skin tones, creating a buildable, dramatic, and chiseled look. The Celestial Powder illuminates facial features in the bestselling universal shade Candlelight, which casts an opalescent, radiant glow over the beautiful contours of the face. Both cashmere-like textures blend easily together for natural-looking definition and subtle glow.

What else you need to know:
"Contouring is all about dimensions. It's about highlighting and deepening certain areas of the face for more drama or more definition."—Kevyn Aucoin, Founder

What it is:
An oil-free foundation that delivers full, natural-looking coverage with one drop, for lightweight, 16-hour wear.

What it does:
Get full-coverage, lightweight foundation coverage with All Day Luminous Weightless Foundation. This foundation is highly pigmented and leaves a natural-looking finish. Perfectly balanced, this breakthrough, full-coverage formula builds and blends effortlessly. Sweat- and humidity-proof, it instantly neutralizes redness and dullness, while it works to reduce discoloration for more even, uniform skin. Perfect for all skin types, it features Weightless Long-wear Technology, an exclusive blend from NARS with flexible polymers and treated pigments that move with the skin while providing 16 hours of staying power.

What it is formulated WITHOUT:
- Parabens

What else you need to know:
"It’s the first time we’ve ever done a high-coverage foundation. We waited for the right moment, when true weightless innovation was finally available. It had to be comfortable, high-coverage, and incredibly long-lasting—the formula really had to be perfect. It’s high-performance, but still very soft and natural."— François Nars, Founder and Creative Director

This product is free of fragrance and is dermatologist tested.

A velvety-soft, matte lip stain.

Give lips ultimate comfort, silky texture, and a radiant-looking finish. Giorgio Armani introduces Lip Maestro: the next generation of lip color that imparts intensely illuminating color.
